DOC.brief_summary: This study multicenter , 9 month , open label extension study patient willing eligible continue pivotal , double-blind S308.3.002 study .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label SLV308 Safety Extension Study S308.3.002 Patients With Parkinson 's Disease Experiencing Motor Fluctuations .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients complete S308.3.002 trial Exclusion Criteria Patients medically relevant abnormal finding ( ECG , physical examination , Aes ) end maintenance phase ( visit M6 , week 24 ) study S308.3.002
